definition: to roll up/to curl up/(of dust etc) to swirl up
to roll (up)/to sweep up/to carry on/roll

to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group

sentences.english: If I roll it up, my blanket can change into a pillow.
sentences.chinese: 如果我把它捲起來，我的毯子能變成一個枕頭。

sentences.english: Just roll it up and have a bite, Amy.
sentences.chinese: 把餅捲起來，咬一口嚐嚐吧，埃米。

sentences.english: Some go even further to beat the heat, rolling up their pants legs.
sentences.chinese: 有些人爲了祛暑甚至過而無不及，竟捲起褲腿來。

sentences.english: Because of assailing Jiang Ling county, in the mistake, the evil plot, rolls up horse and foot.
sentences.chinese: 由於攻擊在錯誤，邪惡計劃中江陵，馬和腳捲起。

sentences.english: By Noon the Sea went very high indeed.
sentences.chinese: 到了中午，大海捲起了狂瀾。

sentences.english: Like the storm gods in the myths of Israel's neighbors, Yahweh heaps up the waters with a blast of wind.
sentences.chinese: 就像猶太人鄰居的神話，耶和華用狂風捲起巨浪。

sentences.english: He started up the shore with the mast furled sail of his boat.
sentences.chinese: 他拿着桅竿和捲起的船帆，往岸上爬去。

sentences.english: Wind up the polythene papers on the bottom after all fish meal is discharged in each hold.
sentences.chinese: 每個艙的魚粉全部卸完後要把艙底的油紙捲起來。

sentences.english: The man tucked up his trousers for wading.
sentences.chinese: 那人捲起褲子，準備涉水。

sentences.english: I rolled up my sleevesand went back to Lulu.
sentences.chinese: 我捲起袖子，回到露露身邊。

sentences.english: The bag is then unhooked or rolled up around the waist.
sentences.chinese: 這個袋子然後被解開或者捲起繞在腰部。

sentences.english: Wad the newspaper and hit the flies with it.
Beginning from the tucked in end, start making pleats in the Sari, about 5 inches deep.
sentences.chinese: 從年底的捲起，開始褶皺的瑪丹薩里，約5英寸深。

sentences.english: He unstepped the mast and furled the sail and tied it.
sentences.chinese: 他拔下桅杆，把帆捲起，繫住。

sentences.english: He backs off and removes a rolled piece of paper from his jumpsuit.
sentences.chinese: 他退後幾步，從病號服中拿出一張捲起的紙。

definition: to roll (up)/to sweep up/to carry on/roll
to raise one's head/to perk up
to push aside/to part/to brush away
to flip over/to turn (a page)/to scroll (an electronic document)/to stir (food in a pot etc)/to move things about/to rummage
